channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- NetIron XMR/MLX and Brocade CES/CER on NetIron
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- NetIron XMR/MLX and Brocade CES/CER on NetIron

item.title: CVE-2016-8209|2024-08-06T02:13:21.816Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- netiron%20xmr%2Fmlx%20and%20brocade%20ces%2Fcer%20on%20netiron
item.description: Improper checks for unusual or exceptional conditions in Brocade NetIron 05.8.00 and later releases up to and including 06.1.00, when the Management Module is continuously scanned on port 22, may allow attackers to cause a denial of service (crash and reload) of the management module.
